greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Binomial transform of A109747.
comment: Equals triple binomial transform of A014182.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
formula: G.f.: (G(0) - 1)/(x-1) where G(k) =  1 - 1/(1+k*x-2*x)/(1-x/(x-1/G(k+1) )); (recursively defined continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jan 17 2013
mathematica: Join[{1}, Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Exp[2*x + 1 - Exp[-x]], {x, 0, 50}], x]*Range[0, 50]!]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 31 2016 *)
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Dec 31 2008
